name: 骰子勇士 Dice Warrior
description: Play a legendary adventurer, kill a blood route in a town that is affected by evil spirits. 100+ skill card, unique talent system, random events in dungeons, seize every opportunity, don't die!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 or later Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0c compatible video card 512MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
